description: Jimmy Durano is in the business of breaking hearts. With the aim of tearing apart toxic relationships, how can you call him selfish? Either way he’s a pro at getting what he wants. And this time he wants Roman Todd’s cock. Their blowing is interrupted when Griffin Barrows barges in—but he can play this game too. Roman and Jimmy spit-roast Griffin, taking turns at each end.
title: Heartbreakers Part 1
